meaningMnemonic: <radical>Poop</radical> <radical>Poop</radical> <radical>Mountain</radical> is covered in poop because it is such a <kanji>secluded</kanji> place.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>secluded</kanji> Poop Poop Mountain is a favorite of <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう). They go there to get away from their phones to get in touch with nature again.
